'''Auredhir''' was the son of [[Dior]] and the brother of [[Elwing]] according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. It is said that his looks were akin to his grandfather [[Beren]] and for that reason he was loved by all. He was slain by the [[sons of Fëanor]] in their attempt to reclaim the [[Nauglafring]].<ref>{{LT2|IV}}, pp. 240-1</ref> 

Auredhir disappeared completely in later versions of the legendarium,<ref>{{LT2|IVn}}, p. 251</ref> replaced by the characters of [[Eluréd]] and [[Elurín]].
